alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:54AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Latah, northwestern Benewah, southwestern Kootenai, eastern Adams, northeastern Whitman, southeastern Lincoln and southern Spokane Counties through 930 AM PDT... At 854 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles north of Colfax, or 25 miles southeast of Cheney, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheney, Medical Lake, Plummer, Fairchild AFB, Tekoa, Fairfield, Garfield, Rosalia, St. John, Rockford, Oakesdale, Spangle, Malden, Latah, Waverly, Amber, Steptoe, Revere, Belmont, and Thornton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 261 and 272. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 388 and 398. U.S. Highway 195 in Washington between mile markers 45 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
